{"id":271303029,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1571512092,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/271303029/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"8.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        int output = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < 32; ++i) {\n            if((n - 1) == (n & (n - 1))) {\n                output = (output << 1) + 1;\n            } else {\n                output = output << 1;\n            }\n            n = n >> 1;\n        }\n        return output;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
